description: Try our easy to follow Ricotta, Sultana & Lemon Strudels recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ricotta, Sultana & Lemon Strudels Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 30 minutes or until pastry is crisp and golden. Cool strudels on tray for 5 minutes. Dust with icing sugar and serve with lemon slices.
